title: Tasteful Twist
description: Tasteful Twist is a web app offering diverse global recipes via multiple server-side API integrations. Users can explore various cuisines like Italian, Greek, and Spanish, view detailed recipes, and save favorites locally. I developed secure signup/sign-in pages and integrated EmailJS for streamlined email communication, enhancing user interaction.

title: MayflyOasis
description: MayFly Oasis is an interactive web platform designed to enhance user engagement through dynamic features and a visually appealing layout. This website serves as a showcase for creativity, offering a user-friendly interface that highlights various functionalities, such as smooth navigation and responsive design. It effectively demonstrates skills in front-end development, including HTML, CSS, and React JS, while emphasizing usability and aesthetic appeal. The site provides a seamless experience for users, making it a valuable resource for anyone interested in exploring its content.

title: ReadMe Generator
description: The README.md file generator is a user-friendly tool designed to help developers easily create professional GitHub documentation. It allows users to generate structured README files that include setup instructions, usage details, contribution guidelines, and more. This project demonstrates proficiency in JavaScript and Node.js, highlighting skills in building accessible, functional tools for streamlined project documentation.

title: Bakery
description: A modern bakery web application that showcases various bakery products with an easy-to-navigate interface. It features a clean design and smooth browsing experience for users to explore products, prices, and order details.

title: Bakery Project2
description: Bakery Project 2 is a sleek and modern website showcasing a range of artisan baked goods. The site highlights delicious pastries, cakes, and breads, with a clean design that offers an inviting and user-friendly experience.

title: Day Planner
description: 'Day Planner' is a web application designed to help users organize their daily schedules efficiently. Built with JavaScript, jQuery, and Bootstrap, this project highlights the ability to create dynamic, responsive interfaces with a focus on functionality and ease of use. The site offers users a clear, intuitive interface for time management, making it a useful tool for personal productivity.

title: Personal Portfolio
description: This portfolio highlights key projects and web development expertise, showcasing a clean and modern design. It emphasizes simplicity and intuitive navigation, allowing users to easily explore work, technical skills, and professional journey.

title: Book App
description: This project is a **React JS-based web application** designed to allow users to browse, view details of, and manage a personalized list of favorite books. The application fetches book data from an external API and allows users to add or remove books from their favorites list. It leverages several modern React JS features and libraries such as **React Router DOM v6**, **Context API**, and **Axios**.
